caption.p: Population structure as determined by principal coordinates analysis (PCoA) of 141 individuals of Lippia spp. Group 1—(Alb) L. alba; Group 2—(Lup) L. lupulina; Group 3—(Lor) L. origanoides, (Orv) L. origanoides × velutina, (Lv) L. velutina, (Sid) L. sidoides, (Sal) L. salviifolia and (Lgr) L. grata
